main.name: Udit Saxena
main.bio: Hi there! I am Udit! currently associated with Relevel a startup of Unacademy group based at Bengaluru as Sr Finance Associate, looking after sales and expense reco, payment mobilisation and control, expense management and also assisting Sales, operations team in sales reconciliation and payment tracking. I am profiecient in Excel including other Microsoft office tools, Tally ERP and Oracle accounting software. I am a B.com (H) graduate from Calcutta University and a Semi Qualified CA from ICAI (pursuing CA Final). My previous employer, SREI Equipment Finance Ltd, being a listed entity, gave me handfull experience in MIS, Budgeting, Accounts Payable/ receivable, GST, TDS, Data sorting/ validation and Vendor management. Have worked with a team of 12 members where I have enhanced my skills as an active team member and also contributed to my professional growth as an individual contributor. In my past experience, have worked with a State Govt. organisation where I single handedly transformed a manual accounting system into a computerised accounting and got praised from senior authorities. Having accounting experience in IT, Government sector, Advisory, NBFC and Startup. I am having zeal to learn new things and to use those skills and knowledge to contribute to the organisation's success.
main.contactmessage: Would love to be part of your esteemed organisation and would definitely add tangible values for the succes of your fast paced organisation!
